en: When I would heal Israel, then is the iniquity of Ephraim uncovered, and the wickedness of Samaria; for they commit falsehood, and the thief entereth in, and the troop of robbers ravageth without.
hmr: Israel sukdam ka tum leh Ephraim khawhlona a hung inlang a. Samaria rîtlona leh, hlêm an chîng a nih. Sûng tieng inru a hung lût a, Tuol tienga chun suomhmang ruolin an suom sih a,

en: And they consider not in their hearts that I remember all their wickedness: now have their own doings beset them about; they are before my face.
hmr: An rîtlona po po chu ka hriet zing ti An lungrilin an ngaituo nawh; Tuhin chu an thilthawhai ngeiin a chîm vêl tlat tah a, Ka hmaihma ngeiah an um a nih.

en: They make the king glad with their wickedness, and the princes with their lies.
hmr: An rîtlona chun laltak an suklâwm a; An thu khêlin mi lienhai an suklâwm bawk a.

en: They are all adulterers; they are as an oven heated by the baker; he ceaseth to stir the fire, from the kneading of the dough, until it be leavened.
hmr: An rêngin uire an na, Bei siemtuin thuk a ur lum, Beiphit a hmethnâk a tho hmaa, Mei tâwl a châwlsan hri ang hi an nih.

en: On the day of our king the princes made themselves sick with the heat of wine; he stretched out his hand with scoffers.
hmr: Ei laltak nia chun mi lienhai chu uoin inruitakin an insukrui a, Ama chun hmusittuhai ruolin a kut a phar a.

en: For they have made ready their heart like an oven, while they lie in wait: their baker sleepeth all the night; in the morning it burneth as a flaming fire.
hmr: Inrûka an inchân laiin an lungril chu thuk ang elin an siem tah a; An lunginsen chu zânkhawvârin a dei a, Zîngkâr chun meichawk angin a hung chawk a.

en: They are all hot as an oven, and devour their judges; all their kings are fallen: there is none among them that calleth unto me.
hmr: Thuk ang elin an sa vawng a, an rorêltuhai an sukbohmang a; An laltak taphawthai chu an tluh a, Anni lai tukhawm a mi ko an um nawh.

en: Ephraim, he mixeth himself among the peoples; Ephraim is a cake not turned.
hmr: Ephraim hlak chu hnam danghai lai ân zêlsa a, Ephraim chu bei inlet lo a nih.

en: Strangers have devoured his strength, and he knoweth it not: yea, gray hairs are here and there upon him, and he knoweth it not.
hmr: Mikhuolhai chun a hrâtna an fâk zopêk a, Ama chun chu a hriet nawh; Hmul inṭuokin ama chu a bâwm nuol tah a, Ama chun chu a hriet nawh.

en: And the pride of Israel doth testify to his face: yet they have not returned unto Jehovah their God, nor sought him, for all this.
hmr: Israel chapona chun ama thiemnawzie ân hriettir a, Nisienlakhawm, hieng po poa khawm hin, LALPA an Pathien tieng chu an ngha nawh a, Ama chu an zawng bawk nawh,

en: And Ephraim is like a silly dove, without understanding: they call unto Egypt, they go to Assyria.
hmr: Ephraim chu vaṭhu inhai, hrietthiemna nei lo ang a lo na, Aigupta tieng an ko vak a, Assuria tienga chun an fe vak a;

en: When they shall go, I will spread my net upon them; I will bring them down as the birds of the heavens; I will chastise them, as their congregation hath heard.
hmr: An fe chu an chungah ka lên hei dêng ka ta, Chunglêng vate man angin man ka tih; An thil suol thaw ang huin anni hrem ka tih.

en: Woe unto them! for they have wandered from me; destruction unto them! for they have trespassed against me: though I would redeem them, yet they have spoken lies against me.
hmr: An chung a rik ie; ka kuoma inthawkin an fe hmang ta sih a! Bohmangna an chungah a tlung ie, ka chungah an hel ta sih a! Kei chun anni sandam ka nuom a, Anni ruok chun khêl an mi hril khum a,

en: And they have not cried unto me with their heart, but they howl upon their beds: they assemble themselves for grain and new wine; they rebel against me.
hmr: An lungril takin an mi ko nawh a, An khum laizâwlah an chierinthluok mei mei a nih; Bu le uoin dingin an inkhâwm a, ka chunga chun an hel sih a.

en: Though I have taught and strengthened their arms, yet do they devise mischief against me.
hmr: Kei chun an bânhai chu inchûktirin ka sukhrât a, Nisienlakhawm, ka chungah thil ṭha naw an suongtuo a nih.

en: They return, but not to him that is on high; they are like a deceitful bow; their princes shall fall by the sword for the rage of their tongue: this shall be their derision in the land of Egypt.
hmr: An ngha kîr a, Achunghnungtak kuomah ni loin; Thalngul rul ang an nih, An mi lienhai chu an ṭawng pâwngpawr leiin kâwlhnâmin tlûng an tih; Hi hi Aigupta rama nuizatbûr an nina nîng a tih.
